content:
Diagnosis:		Clear cell carcinoma of liver

Management:		Right hepatectomy March 2024

Histology:		pT3aN0M0 clear cell carcinoma, CD10 positive, margins clear

Current Situation:	Post-operative surveillance

[redacted name] attended liver clinic today for first post-operative review. The surgical wounds have healed well with no complications. Her liver function tests are satisfactory with ALT 45, bilirubin 15, and albumin 38. AFP remains normal at 3.2. She reports good energy levels and has returned to most normal activities. Her appetite is excellent and weight is stable at 68kg. Examination shows no concerning features. CT chest/abdomen/pelvis performed last week shows expected post-operative changes with no evidence of disease. The plan is to continue surveillance with 3-monthly AFP and 6-monthly imaging.

primary_cancer.histopathology_status: clear cell carcinoma, CD10 positive, margins clear

cancer_timeline.value: Liver function satisfactory - ALT 45, bilirubin 15, albumin 38, AFP 3.2
CT chest/abdomen/pelvis shows expected post-operative changes with no evidence of disease

patient_facts.value: Surgical wounds healed well with no complications
Good energy levels, returned to most normal activities

status_updates.value: Clear cell carcinoma of liver treated with right hepatectomy. First post-operative review shows good recovery with no evidence of disease.
Continue surveillance with 3-monthly AFP and 6-monthly imaging
